title: Frisa App
description: Designed a catalog system for users to discover nearby assistance organizations.

title: Neora Chatbot
description: Web application chatbot, using Cite and TypeScript for the backend, Tailwind CSS, and React for the frontend.

title: Vida Plena
description: Developed a web application tailored for elderly individuals for them to take well-being test.

title: Machine Learning for Kids
description: Organized classes teaching kids the fundamentals of machine learning using Scratch, helping them understand concepts like classification and training data.

title: Unity Classes Using Unity and C#
description: Conducted Unity classes where students learned how to create 2D and 3D games using Unity and C#. Topics covered included physics, game objects, and basic game development concepts.

title: Intelligent Vegetable Patch
description: Developed a smart vegetable patch system using Arduino to monitor soil moisture, temperature, and humidity. Parsed sensor data using Python for real-time analysis to optimize conditions.

title: Harvester Simulation for John Deere Using Q-Learning
description: Simulated autonomous harvester operations in Unity for John Deere, implementing Q-Learning to optimize route planning and harvesting efficiency.
